metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8747 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The multifilesystem storage backend in Radicale before 1.1 allows remoteattackers to read or write to arbitrary files via a crafted component name.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8747` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-radicale - 1.1.1-1
python3-radicale - 1.1.1-1
radicale - 1.1.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: radicale package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.1-1').
